name: Urannag

specials.name: Encage
specials.description:
If a target is flat footed and shares its space or rendered restrained by an Urannag's attacks it may attempt to encage it.  The Urannag attempts an athletics check versus the target's fortitude DC.
Critical Success:  The target takes 2d8+9 damage, is confined to the space inside the Urannag, and is prone.
Success:  The target takes 2d8+9 damage, and is confined to the space inside the Urannag
Failure:  The target is still restrained (if previously) but not encaged.
Critical Failure:  The target is released (if they were restrained).
The trapped creature may cut themselves free (22 AC, Hardness 15, 60 HP (BT 30)) by meeting the break threshold of the creature or attempt an escape check DC 30.  If the target remains within the Urannag at the end of their turn they take 2d6+9 piercing from stabbing spines.

specials.name: Opened Mechanics
specials.description:
A creature adjacent to an Urannag may attempt a Disable Device (Thievery) check against the Urannag's Fortitude DC.  All damage from weakness bypasses resistances.
Critical Success:  The Urannag takes double the damage equal to the excess of the DC and is stunned 2 for 1 round.
Success:  The Urannag takes damage equal to the excess of the DC of the check.
Failure:  No effect.
Critical Failure:  The Urannag may uses it's reaction to attempt to Encage the creature who failed the check.

savenote: +1 status bonus to saves vs. magic

immunity.value: bleed, death effects, diseased, doomed, drained, fatigued, healing, necromancy, nonlethal attacks, paralyzed, poison, sickened, unconscious, mental
